name: India
interesting_fact: India is the largest democracy in the world.

name: United States
interesting_fact: The U.S. has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.

name: China
interesting_fact: The Great Wall of China is the longest man-made structure in the world.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is known for having the largest economy in Europe.

name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has the highest number of vending machines per capita in the world.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is the only continent without an active volcano.

name: France
interesting_fact: The Eiffel Tower in France was supposed to be a temporary structure.

name: Russia
interesting_fact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.

name: Italy
interesting_fact: Italy is home to the smallest country in the world, Vatican City.

name: South Korea
interesting_fact: South Korea is known for having the fastest internet connection speed globally.

name: Mexico
interesting_fact: Mexico introduced chocolate to the world.

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: Egypt is home to one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, the Great Pyramid of Giza.
